requirements.summary: Build a responsive homepage showcasing exactly six products using the provided uploaded images and names.
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage renders a product grid/list with exactly 6 products matching the names provided by the user.
Each product card displays the corresponding uploaded image and product name.
Layout is responsive (mobile, tablet, desktop) with no horizontal scrolling at common breakpoints.

Create a reusable product card component that renders product image + name and supports click/keyboard selection; use shadcn-ui Card/Button styling primitives if available (compose only). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a responsive grid/list component that renders exactly six ProductCard items from frontend/src/data/products.ts and adapts layout across common breakpoints (mobile/tablet/desktop).

requirements.summary: Provide a product details experience (modal/drawer or page) for each item showing name, larger image, and a short description.
acceptanceCriteria: Selecting a product from the main list opens a details view for that specific product.
Details view includes the correct product name and the same image shown on the card, displayed larger.
User can close the details view and return to the product list.

file_operations.description: Add a product details modal component that displays selected product name, larger image, and a short generic description; prefer shadcn-ui Dialog for accessible modal behavior (compose only). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire product selection state so clicking a ProductCard opens ProductDetailsDialog for that specific product, and closing returns to the product list view.

requirements.summary: Add basic cake shop site sections: header with site name, navigation links (Home/Products/Contact), and a contact section with placeholder details.
acceptanceCriteria: Header is visible and contains a site name plus navigation links that scroll to sections or navigate within the app.
A Contact section is present and includes placeholder address, phone, and email text.
Navigation works on both desktop and mobile (e.g., collapses into a menu or stacks appropriately).

file_operations.description: Create a responsive header with site name and navigation links targeting in-page sections (e.g., #home, #products, #contact); for mobile navigation, use shadcn-ui Sheet (drawer) or equivalent composed UI components (no modifications under frontend/src/components/ui). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create a Contact section component with placeholder address/phone/email text suitable for a small cake shop website.
Wire SiteHeader into the top of the page and add section anchors/IDs for Home/Products/Contact; render ContactSection near the bottom so navigation links scroll correctly on desktop and mobile.

requirements.summary: Apply a coherent warm bakery-themed visual design across the site and avoid blue/purple as dominant theme colors.
acceptanceCriteria: Site uses a consistent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing) across header, product cards, details view, and contact section.
Primary visual styling reads as a bakery/cake shop theme (warm neutrals; not a tech/enterprise look).
No blue/purple is used as the dominant brand color (accents are acceptable, but theme should not be blue/purple-led).

file_operations.description: Define global styles and/or Tailwind theme CSS variables for a warm bakery palette (cream/caramel/chocolate tones), friendly typography defaults, soft surfaces, and subtle shadows; ensure overall styling is consistent across all sections and avoids blue/purple as the primary theme.

Refine product card styling to match the bakery theme (soft surfaces, subtle shadows, warm accents) while remaining responsive; use shadcn-ui composed components if available. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Align the details modal styling with the bakery theme (typography, spacing, warm accents) and ensure the larger image presentation is visually consistent; compose shadcn-ui Dialog styling primitives if available. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply bakery-themed header styling (warm background, readable nav, appropriate spacing) and ensure mobile/desktop navigation remains usable and consistent with the theme; compose shadcn-ui primitives if used. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Apply consistent bakery-themed styling (card-like section, warm neutrals, readable labels) for the contact section to match the rest of the site.
